title: WTS: T206 John McGraw (Port./ no cap) SGC 88!**SOLD**
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: WTS: T206 John McGraw (Port./ no cap) SGC 88!**SOLD**
posts.post_content:
Incredible card... Perfect color and registration, snow white borders, almost perfect centering, Pied 150 reverse. Highest graded by SGC, and very recently graded. The last PSA 8 sold for over $10K. Asking $6500 delivered with insurance. This is an amazing card. 
Now available for $5500...thanks..SOLD**

[URL=http://s1122.photobucket.com/user/sean11251/media/img236_zpsec5e0e25.jpg.html][IMG]http://i1122.photobucket.com/albums/l540/sean11251/img236_zpsec5e0e25.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

If this is a 10K card, why would you sell it for $6500? It doesn't make any sense to me, so WHY?

Respectfully,
Fred
I assume because the card he is selling is SGC not PSA and maybe doesn't have same eye appeal?

[quote name="GoldenAge50s" post=1232129]If this is a 10K card, why would you sell it for $6500? It doesn't make any sense to me, so WHY?

Respectfully,
Fred[/QUOTE]

Fred- I said that the last PSA 8 sold for that, this card is SGC graded. High grade SGC cards simply don't sell for prices that PSA graded cards do.

OK Guys--Thanks for the replies.

It's that Registry thing when it comes to the highest grades.
T206 trades and cash difference a possibility....Let me know
big price reduction, thanks for looking...$5800 delivered with insurance
